A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ is definitely ambitious.....just in the wrong ways. This movie failed to make any of the villains a serious threat if not ignored or killed off. The casino planet was a complete waste of time and Del Toro's character completely useless. I like some of the stuff with Luke. Luke fighting the false perception the galaxy has of him. Hate the saber throw and hate the fact he was killed off in the second film.
